*[[Pennsylvania]] - Second degree misdemeanor under [http://www.legis.state.pa.us/WU01/LI/LI/CT/HTM/18/00.055.010.000..HTM 18 Pa. Cons. Stat. Â§ 5510], "a person who treats a corpse in a way that he knows would outrage ordinary family sensibilities commits a misdemeanor of the second degree".
